ing: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of chicken soup
1 (10.75 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
des: "This is a wonderful recipe passed on to me from my Dad.  It is simple and delicious -- perfect for family gatherings!  I usually make this dish the night before and pop in the oven the next day.  This dish also freezes very well."
ins:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil.  Add noodles and cook for 8 to 10 minutes or until al dente; drain.
In a medium bowl, combine chicken soup, mushroom soup, onion, Parmesan cheese, sour cream, mayonnaise and garlic salt.
In a 9x13 inch baking dish, layer 1/3 of the noodles, soup mixture, chicken and cheese; repeat 3 times, ending with cheese.
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour.
